underlying_goal: Reduce the `max_connections` setting in all relevant YAML configuration files to 100 and commit the changes.
primary_success: Intelligently handling the git commit process by identifying unrelated changes and splitting them into logical, separate commits with good messages.
brief_summary: The user asked to reduce `max_connections` in YAML files to 100. Claude identified and updated 12 files. The user then requested to commit the work, but there were unrelated changes. Claude intelligently split the work into three separate logical commits, handling the complexity gracefully.
